agency_desc: A community mental health agency offering consultation and treatment. Outpatient, case management, therapy, residential, vocational, medical, group, and day programs are available.
service_description: Offers a support helpline for veterans, and their families, to access free mental health care and counseling services. Participants are connected with local professionals well-versed in military culture. Services include assessment and referral, individual, couple, and family therapy, online message boards, substance abuse groups, and therapeutic retreats for military families.
taxonomy_category: Mental Health and Substance Use Disorder Services
site_details: Call to schedule an appointment with a local therapist. -- Sign up with a support group online.
site_eligibility: Veterans (of any status) and their loved ones
